review: So far so good, waiting for the IOS app
author: David M. B

review: After already having a Chromecast...my early assessment of the Fire TV Stick is positive. At $19.99 (2-day special) I cannot justify giving this device less than 4 stars. I have been using it for a few days now with no hiccups.
author: Ikenna Okonkwo

review: Awesome streaming device. Very easy to use and i really like that I can take it with me easily when I travel.
author: Jeff Miracle

review: The gadget works great, though now that I have it, I'm not sure why I bought it, other than the $19.95 introductory price.  I can already access most of the features on my TV and through my PS4.  Yes, i am a gadget-holic.  Anyway, setup was simple, and Fire TV Stick is simple to use and navigate.  The only reason I'm deducting a star is that the batteries that came with the remote were DOA.  Come on Amazon.  You make a bazillion dollars a year and you're skimping on batteries?
author: Carnac767

review: Proximity to wi-fi seems to be key in the smooth operation of this device. I like it, but don't love it--sometimes the load is glitchy and slow. This is probably more due to my system than the Fire TV Stick. Glad for the access to Amazon Prime content.
author: TLH "TanyaLee"

review: Navigation is a little slugish, but overall great device so far.

review: Great deal for the $20 I paid for it.  Fast and smooth.

review: Works as well as the fire TV box that I have in another room. Very pleased.
